required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness of Decision-aid Video on Colorectal Cancer Screening
clinical_study.official_title: Effectiveness of Decision-aid Video on Colorectal Cancer Screening in Primary Healthcare Setting: A Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Colorectal cancer (CRC) is the second most common cancer in Malaysia. Diagnosing CRC at early stage is crucial to reduce their mortality risk. To achieve this aim, CRC screening promotion intervention is deemed necessary.

detailed_description.textblock:
High-quality CRC screening interventions and approaches should be delivered to a large proportion of target population.
To our knowledge, there is no interactive video been developed, that can be used as educational tool for CRC screening in Malaysia. By developing an educational video, we hope that it can be used by health professionals to promote CRC screening, favoring their empowerment for prevention and control of disease.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Parallel randomized controlled trial will be conducted in 3 months duration, with intention-to-treat.
study_design_info.masking_description: Investigators will designate participants to which arm using random sampling. Participants and care providers are masked to which arm they receive.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with colorectal cancer screening completion
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with completion of fecal occult blood test or colonoscopy procedures by participants

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with colonoscopy completion among those with positive fecal occult blood test
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants who are completed colonoscopy among those positive fecal occult blood test

secondary_outcome.measure: Period time from intervention to fecal occult blood test uptake
secondary_outcome.description: Duration taken after received intervention to screening uptake

secondary_outcome.measure: Barriers towards the colorectal cancer screening uptake
secondary_outcome.description: List of barriers (numbers) towards the colorectal cancer screening uptake

intervention.description: Decision-aid video will be developed to disseminate knowledge and to raise awareness on colorectal cancer screening

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Malaysian aged 50 - 74 years old
- No previous history or family history of CRC
- Asymptomatic of CRC
- Never participated in CRC screening
Exclusion Criteria:
- Acute patients
- Patients on aspirin, warfarin or any blood-thinning agent
- Illiterate or having a significant vision or hearing impairment

patient_data.ipd_description: Only three principal investigators will have access to participants' data
